      public RestApi()

  • Method Details

    • login

      public String login(String email, String password) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Authenticates a user by sending their email and password to the login endpoint.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user attempting to log in
      password - the password of the user attempting to log in
      Returns:
      the response body as a String if the login is successful (HTTP status code 201), or "Login Error" if the login attempt fails
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted while waiting for the response

    • getOneUser

      public User getOneUser(String userId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a single user based on the provided user ID and authentication token.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user to retrieve
      authToken - the authentication token for authorization
      Returns:
      the user object corresponding to the provided user ID
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while making the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the thread executing the request is interrupted

    • getAllBankAccounts

      public BankAccount[] getAllBankAccounts(User user) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves all bank accounts associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose bank accounts are to be retrieved; must contain a valid user ID and authentication token
      Returns:
      an array of BankAccount objects associated with the specified user
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while making the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the thread executing the request is interrupted

    • getAccountExpenses

      public Expense[] getAccountExpenses(String accountId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the list of expenses associated with a specific bank account.
      Parameters:
      accountId - the unique identifier of the bank account for which expenses are to be fetched
      authToken - the authentication token used for
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • getAccountIncomes

      public Income[] getAccountIncomes(String accountId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the list of incomes associated with a specific bank account.
      Parameters:
      accountId - the unique identifier of the bank account for which incomes are to be fetched
      authToken - the authentication token used for authorization
      Returns:
      an array of Income objects associated with the specified bank account; returns an empty array if an error occurs during the data retrieval process
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while making the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the thread executing the request is interrupted

    • createUser

      public String createUser(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String password) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Creates a new user by sending the provided details to the user creation endpoint.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the user to be created
      lastName - the last name of the user to be created
      email - the email address of the user to be created
      password - the password for the new user account
      Returns:
      the response body as a String after the user is created
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the thread executing the request is interrupted

    • createAccount

      public String createAccount(String userId, String currency, String fistName, String lastName, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Creates a new bank account for a user by sending the account details to the account creation endpoint.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user owning the account
      currency - the currency type for the new account (e.g., "HUF")
      fistName - the first name of the account owner
      lastName - the last name of the account owner
      authToken - the authentication token used for authorization
      Returns:
      the response body as a String after the account is created
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while making the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted while waiting for the response

    • createExpense

      public String createExpense(int total, String category, String description, String userId, String bankAccountId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Creates a new expense by sending the given expense details to the corresponding endpoint.
      Parameters:
      total - the total amount of the expense
      category - the category of the expense (e.g., "Food", "Travel")
      description - a brief description of the expense
      userId - the unique identifier of the user who owns the expense
      bankAccountId - the unique identifier of the bank account associated with the expense
      authToken - the authentication token used for authorization
      Returns:
      the response body as a String received from the server after creating the expense
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while making the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the thread executing the request is interrupted

    • createIncome

      public String createIncome(int total, String category, String description, String userId, String bankAccountId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Creates a new income record by sending the provided income details to the corresponding endpoint.
      Parameters:
      total - the total amount of the income
      category - the category of the income (e.g., "Salary", "Investment")
      description - a brief description of the income
      userId - the unique identifier of the user who owns the income
      bankAccountId - the unique identifier of the bank account associated with the income
      authToken - the authentication token used for authorization
      Returns:
      the response body as a String received from the server after creating the income
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while making the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the thread executing the request is interrupted

    • getEur

      public Eur getEur(int daysBack) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the Euro (EUR) exchange rates data for a specified number of days back from the current date.
      Parameters:
      daysBack - the number of days back from the current date for which to retrieve the EUR exchange rates data; 0 represents the current date, 1 represents yesterday, and so on
      Returns:
      an instance of the Eur class containing the exchange rate data for the specified date
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the thread executing the request is interrupted

    • getUsd

      public Usd getUsd(int daysBack) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the USD exchange rates data for a specified number of days back from the current date.
      Parameters:
      daysBack - the number of days back from the current date to retrieve the USD exchange rates data; 0 represents the current date, 1 represents yesterday, and so on
      Returns:
      an instance of the Usd class containing the exchange rate data for the specified date
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted while waiting for the response

    • connectUser

      public void connectUser(String accId, String email, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Updates a user's email address by sending a PATCH request to the designated endpoint.
      Parameters:
      accId - the unique identifier of the user's account
      email - the new email address to associate with the user's account
      authToken - the authentication token for authorization
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending or receiving the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted while waiting for the response

    • removeCardFromUser

      public void removeCardFromUser(String accId, String userId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Removes a card from a user's account by sending a disconnection request to the server.
      Parameters:
      accId - The account ID from which the card is to be disconnected.
      userId - The ID of the user whose card is being removed.
      authToken - The authorization token required to authenticate the request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the request.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted while waiting for a response.

    • deleteCardFromUser

      public void deleteCardFromUser(String accId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Deletes a card associated with a specific user account.
      Parameters:
      accId - The unique identifier of the user account from which the card is to be deleted.
      authToken - The authorization token used to authenticate the request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the HTTP request.
      InterruptedException - If the HTTP request operation is interrupted.

    • transfer

      public void transfer(String userId, String senderId, String receiverId, int amount, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Transfers a specified amount from one account to another. This method sends an HTTP PATCH request to execute the transfer operation.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user initiating the transfer.
      senderId - The ID of the sender's account.
      receiverId - The ID of the receiver's account.
      amount - The amount to be transferred.
      authToken - The authentication token for the user performing the transfer.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving data.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted while waiting for a response.

    • getAllUsers

      public User[] getAllUsers(String accId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Fetches all users associated with a specific account ID.
      Parameters:
      accId - The account ID for which the user information is to be retrieved.
      authToken - The authorization token used for authenticating the API request.
      Returns:
      An array of User objects that belong to the specified account ID.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during the HTTP request or response handling.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted while sending the request or receiving the response.

    • getRepeatableTransactionById

      public RepeatableExpense getRepeatableTransactionById(String accId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a repeatable transaction by its account ID from the server.
      Parameters:
      accId - the account ID associated with the repeatable transaction
      authToken - the authorization token for authenticating the request
      Returns:
      a RepeatableExpense object representing the repeatable transaction
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the request
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for the response

    • stopRepeatableTransaction

      public void stopRepeatableTransaction(String repId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Sends a request to stop a repeatable transaction identified by the given transaction ID.
      Parameters:
      repId - The unique identifier of the repeatable transaction to be stopped.
      authToken - The authorization token used to authenticate the request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the HTTP request.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted while waiting for the response.

    • deleteRepeatableTransactions

      public void deleteRepeatableTransactions(String repId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Deletes a repeatable transaction identified by its unique ID. This method sends a DELETE request to the server to remove the specified repeatable transaction.
      Parameters:
      repId - The ID of the repeatable transaction to delete.
      authToken - The authorization token for authenticating the request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the request.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted while waiting for the response.

    • getAllRepeatableByAccId

      public Collection<? extends RepeatableTransaction> getAllRepeatableByAccId(String accId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves all repeatable transactions associated with a specific account ID.
      Parameters:
      accId - The account ID for which repeatable transactions are to be retrieved.
      authToken - The authorization token to authenticate the request.
      Returns:
      A collection of repeatable transactions associated with the specified account ID.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the request.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted while waiting for a response.

    • deleteTransaction

      public void deleteTransaction(String transactionId, String inpType, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Deletes a transaction by its ID and type.
      Parameters:
      transactionId - the ID of the transaction to delete
      inpType - the type of the transaction (e.g., "Expense" or "Income")
      authToken - the authorization token for API access
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the request
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted

    • createRepeatableTransaction

      public void createRepeatableTransaction(float total, String category, String description, String userId, String bankAccountId, int repeatAmount, String repeatMetric, LocalDate repeatStart, LocalDate repeatEnd, String title, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Creates a repeatable transaction by sending an HTTP POST request.
      Parameters:
      total - The total amount for the transaction.
      category - The category of the transaction.
      description - A description for the transaction.
      userId - The ID of the user associated with the transaction.
      bankAccountId - The ID of the bank account linked with the transaction.
      repeatAmount - The number of times the transaction will repeat.
      repeatMetric - The time metric (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly) defining the repetition interval.
      repeatStart - The start date of the repetition period.
      repeatEnd - The end date of the repetition period.
      title - The title or name of the transaction.
      authToken - The authorization token for API access.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the HTTP request.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted during processing.

    • updateRepeatableTransaction

      public void updateRepeatableTransaction(String accountId, String userId, String authToken) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Updates the status of a repeatable transaction for a specified account by making an HTTP PATCH request to the designated endpoint.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The unique identifier of the account associated with the transaction.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user initiating the update request.
      authToken - The authentication token required for authorization to the API.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while sending or receiving the HTTP request.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted while waiting for the response.

    • getBtc

      public Btc getBtc(int daysBack) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves Bitcoin (BTC) data from a specified number of days back.
      Parameters:
      daysBack - the number of days back from the current date to retrieve Bitcoin data for
      Returns:
      a Btc object containing the retrieved Bitcoin data
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving the HTTP request
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted

    • getEth

      public Eth getEth(int daysBack) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves Ethereum (ETH) currency information for a given number of days back from the current date.
      Parameters:
      daysBack - the number of days to go back from the current date to fetch the Ethereum data.
      Returns:
      an Eth object containing Ethereum (ETH) currency data as per the specified date.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the HTTP request or response handling.
      InterruptedException - if the HTTP request operation is interrupted.
